As part of our move to GitHub, we're closing our CodePlex suggestions and asking that people move them to the GitHub issue tracker for further discussion.  Some feature requests may already be active on GitHub, so please make sure to look for an existing issue before filing a new one.

You can find our GitHub issue tracker here:
https://github.com/microsoft/typeScript/issues
WorkItem.Description:
I want to be able to write one module syntax, e.g. import module1 = require("./src/module1") and have it work in both node and the browser without having a dependency on RequireJS or any other AMD loader.

One easy way to add support for this is to allow the tsc compiler to bundle the modules into a single file, similar to what Browserify does.
WorkItem.Summary: Support CommonJS module import syntax in browser
